description: This file contains the implementation of the drawing board for EDA software using wxWidgets.

lines.description: Holds the drawn lines on the board.

circles.description: Holds the drawn circles on the board.

circleClicked.description: Indicates if the circle tool is selected.

lineClicked.description: Indicates if the line tool is selected.

lineStarted.description: Indicates if the line drawing has started.

lineStartPos.description: The starting position of the line.

lineEndPos.description: The ending position of the line.

onPaint.description: Handles the paint event to draw the grid, lines, and circles.

DrawGrid.description: Draws a grid on the board.

onLeftClick.description: Handles mouse left click events to place circles or lines.

onMouseMove.description: Handles mouse movement events to update line and circle positions.
